summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by updating Tailwind-related CSS variables in `frontend/src/index.css` for both `:root` (light) and `.dark` (dark) to magenta-hued OKLCH values, including `--background`, `--card`, `--popover`, `--border`, `--input`, and `--ring`, with corresponding foreground tokens to preserve contrast.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for theme token updates in `frontend/src/index.css`; changes to project bookkeeping files were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified additional theme tokens not explicitly requested (e.g., `--chart-1` through `--chart-5`, plus broader palette tokens like `--primary`, `--secondary`, `--muted`, `--accent`).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 specifically calls out `--background` and directly related surface tokens (e.g., `--card`, `--popover`, `--border`, `--input`, `--ring`) to achieve the background change; updating chart tokens and the wider palette goes beyond what was explicitly asked (though may be consistent with a full theme shift).
